name: U-Air
tagline: U-Air is a private web cloud.
body:
# Description ## Desktop U-Air allows you to upload, browse and download your files wherever you are. Do you sometimes forget to bring some file from your home computer to your friend? It's not a problem anymore. You can easly browse your files, upload new and listen to songs in MP3. ## Server U-Air allows you to create a private web cloud and easily control your server. ## Raspberry Pi In progress. # Screenshots ![screen 1](https://myapps.developer.ubuntu.com/site_media/appmedia/2013/08/uair.png) ![screen 2](https://myapps.developer.ubuntu.com/site_media/appmedia/2013/08/uair6_1.png) # Download and run: Install libs python-json and python-flask.
Ubuntu: sudo apt-get install python-flask and sudo apt-get install python-json Download and run: * git clone --recursive https://github.com/michal0468/u-air * cd uair * python launcher.py # Bugs Please report bugs to michal0468@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
